nodes.text: The FastFlesh medpac was an advanced medpac manufactured by BioTech Industries. It utilized a number of advanced synthetic biomedical chemicals such as BioTech's Chromostring that allowed for deeper penetration of medicines into a patient's body without causing nerve damage. The treatments in the FastFlesh medpac were so powerful that they could only be used once per day although other medpacs could be used complementary.
